attributes.action: Make funding available to all citizens so that they can take court proceedings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make funding available to all citizens, including home owners, so that they can take court proceedings for human rights abuses carried out by British public bodies such as The Police, The CPS and The IPCC. in oirder that all citizens obtain justice regardless of their finacial means.
